comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: An anonymous late-model P-40 assigned to the 51st FG; the unit's three squadrons were the 16th (tail  numbers 351-400), 25th (201-250) and 26th (251-300). A fourth squadron was later added, the 449th (301-350), the group's only P-38 Lightning operators.
